features-items.heading: Connect your Team
features-items.text1: Our shared calendars make it easy for all team members to stay in touch. Schedule an appointment on your computer; assign crew members and equipment. Arrivy’s intuitive interface makes it easy to see who is available.
features-items.text2: Your team stays in touch with mobile devices (iOS and Android). Crew members can see all the job details directly in Arrivy’s mobile apps. In addition to viewing these details, crew members can record status changes (job started, job ended, etc) and notes directly. These become a permanent record of what has happened on a job—accessible forever.

features-items.heading: Hang up the Phone
features-items.text1: Your time is valuable. Building confidence by helping the customer understand your business, team and approach provides a lot of value. But, calling clients to remind them of an upcoming appointment or to tell them your crew will be 15 min late, does not.
features-items.text2: Arrivy helps you save time by eliminating low-value communications using Arrivy’s automated email & SMS features. Customer’s get appointment reminders, enroute messages and other notifications thru email or SMS.

features-items.heading: Grow your Business
features-items.text1: Arrivy eliminates the need for - customer reminder calls - handling customer inquiries on the day of the job - customer follow-ups for reviews - calling crew for job status - collecting notes and images for work done and damages - calculating travel and job times - managing excel sheets - backing up business data
features-items.text2: and much more. Also, arrivy enables your business to give your customers a modern experience. Happy customers always bring new and repeat business.

features-items.heading: Get more Reviews
features-items.text1:
For home service businesses success or failure is often measured by number of YELP reviews. For better or for worse, YELP, and to a lesser extent—Facebook, Angies List and Google—have become a proxy for walking over to your neighbor’s house and asking, 'Can you recommend a good gardener?' 
 If you want to increase the number of reviews you get—ask for them. It’s easy for Arrivy—since we’ve been sending the customer messages via email and SMS. Arrivy automatically prompts customers to rate you on when a job is marked as complete.
features-items.text2: If the customer rates you 4 or 5 stars, they are also prompted to post their rating on YELP, Facebook or other social sites that you configure. And, you’re immediately emailed the review—so, you know if it’s good news. And, if it’s a poor rating you can contact the customer immediately to make it right.

features-items.heading: Delight your Customers
features-items.text1:
Your clients can track your crew’s arrival times with real-time estimates and email / SMS notifications. As soon as your crew member marks their status as “On our way,” the customer is sent an email or SMS. Clicking on the link in that message, the customer can see the crew location on a map and their estimated arrival time. 
As the crew proceeds to their destination, Arrivy tracks their progress and sends another email / SMS when they are about a mile away.
features-items.text2: Customers love knowing when their appointment will start and being able to see photos of crew members.

features-items.heading: Get real-time Status
features-items.text1: Mobile apps let your crews report status, upload photos and communicate from the field. Task Journals keeps a permanent record of all interactions. The office can monitor crew location and activities from a desktop and add comments to the Journal.
features-items.text2: At the job site, crew members have access to the same information through mobile apps. Task Journals keep everyone on the same page during the job and serve as a permanent record of activities after the job is complete.
